input.sentences: i woke up yesterday and i had to clean my room .
after i finished i made some food for myself because i was starving .
i spent some time thinking about what to do next .

output.sentences: She decided to stop eating junk food.
Today she began eating healthy foods.
She started reflecting on how it made her feel.
She felt so much better after the change.
